QuestData.Title: Felspawns of Lothros
QuestData.Description:
These Felspawns are endless! I can't cut them down quickly enough to get to the dreadlord within the mausoleum.
Master Illidan, will you come with me so we can take down Lothros together?
QuestData.CompletionText: A dreadlord poses little danger to you, eh?
QuestData.RewardText: We've done it! Without you, I fear I would have eventually succumbed to the onslaught.
